content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: sponge
inventory=[{"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 56, "index": 10}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral", "quantity": 11, "index": 16}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 25, "index": 18}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 56, "index": 26}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}]
thought: To solve this task I need to craft a sponge. To craft a sponge I need to smelt a wet_sponge, which is at slot 34, into an empty slot (eg., 11).
act: smelt from slot 34 to slot 11 with quantity 1
